Package slitherio.view

Class DisplayableObject

java.lang.Object
slitherio.view.DisplayableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
FoodView, SegmentView
public abstract class DisplayableObject extends Object
Représente la vue d'un objet. C'est l'équivalent de GameObject pour la vue.

  • Constructor Details

    • DisplayableObject

      protected DisplayableObject(GameObject go, String filename)
      Create a new instance DisplayableObject. This constructor calls bind().
      Parameters:
      go - the object to display
      filename - the object's skin. It's a name of a file in the resources directory.

  • Method Details

    • display

      protected final void display(javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Add graphics in root.
      Parameters:
      root - the Pane where graphics should be added

    • getRotation

      private final double getRotation()
      Return valid angle value of object.angle. Make sure that the angle is always valid.
      Returns:
      valid angle value of object.angle
      See Also:
      • Utils.getValidAngle(double)

    • bind

      private void bind()
      Bind object and graphics. Bind the values of x, y, width, height and angle.
